code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{LoginForm}from'../components/auth/LoginForm';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Login=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{user}=useAuth();const handleLoginSuccess=()=>{if((user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.role)==='admin'){navigate('/admin');}else if((user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.role)==='facility_head'){navigate('/facility');}};React.useEffect(()=>{if(user){handleLoginSuccess();}},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginForm,{onLoginSuccess:handleLoginSuccess});};
